item.title: How We Rebuilt the Machine While Flying It
item.description:
I spoke at Open Conf 2025 about a problem that doesn’t fit neatly into sprint planning: how do you modernize a platform when 20 million people depend on it not breaking?

My talk traced five years of work rebuilding TalentLMS’s interface and infrastructure while the product kept growing. The pandemic had accelerated user growth exponentially, and we were left with a decade-old codebase that had become a bottleneck for everything we wanted to ship.
